channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.description:
Report X-2024020541

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-02
  • City: WALTON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE HAZMAT CLERK BROUGHT A LEAKING HAZMAT OVER TO THE DMP. RESPONDER PUT ON THE PROPER PPE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THEN MOVED THE HAZMAT TO THE TABLES FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024020441
item.description:
Report X-2024020441

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T00:33:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-22
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The contents were found with a torn box and the contents were also leaking. upon being found, the items were brought to QA to be worked on. DescribePack: The box was torn and the contents were leaking out. Once the box was open, the pail inside was noticed to be damaged on the bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The contents were placed in a salvage drum to prevent further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024020484
item.description:
Report X-2024020484

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The cap on one of the bottles came loose and an internal leakage occurred. Upon being found, the item was brought to QA to be worked on. DescribePack: The package had noticeable liquid damage in a corner. When the package was inspected, one of the bottles was found to have a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The contents were placed in a spill tote to prevent further leakage.
